Package org.cpnsim.statemanager

package org.cpnsim.statemanager
  • Class
    Description
    DetailedDcStateSimple
    Used to describe the status of a data center, including the status of each host and the total resource status of the data center.
    HostCapacityManager
    A class to manage the capacity of the hosts.
    HostState
    A class to record the state of a host.
    HostStateGenerator
    An interface to be implemented by each class that generates the state of a host.
    HostStateHistory
    A class to record the state of a host history.
    IsomorphicHostStateGenerator
    A class to generate isomorphic host state.
    PartitionRangesManager
    A class to manage the partition ranges in the datacenter.
    PredictionManager
    An interface to be implemented by each class that predicts the state of a host.
    PredictionManagerSimple
    A class to predict the state of a host.
    RandomHostStateGenerator
    A class to generate random host state.
    SimpleState
    A class to record the simple overall state information of hosts in an entire datacenter These host states are used for scheduling by InterScheduler.
    SimpleStateEasy
    A class implementing the SimpleState interface.
    SimpleStateEasyObject
    The class is the object sent to the inter-scheduler during synchronization.
    StatesManager
    An interface to manage the states of the datacenter.
    StatesManagerSimple
    A class to manage the states of datacenter.
    SynGapManager
    A class to manage the synchronization gap.
    SynState
    This SynState is used by the intra-scheduler for resource scheduling.
    SynStateSimple
    This class implements the interface SynState.
